item.title: Need help with putting in Runecrafting--- got an error help please
item.dc:creator: @sluzas sluzas
item.description:
@sluzas wrote:

[code]Description: Making RuneCrafting so when you click on an alter you get a set amount of XP and runes.

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: C/P Know where to put things’

Tested Server: ZDR

Files/Classes Modified: Client.java

Procedure:

Step1:

Add this to case 132.

if (objectID == 2490) { if (actionTimer == 0) { if (p.GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) { if(playerLevel[20] < 30) { addItem(554, 2); addItem(555, 2); addItem(556, 2); addItem(557, 2); addItem(558, 2); addItem(559, 2); addItem(560, 2); addItem(561, 2); addItem(562, 2); addItem(563, 2); addItem(564, 2); addItem(565, 2); addItem(566, 2); actionTimer = 3; addSkillXP(200, 20); } if(playerLevel[20] >= 31 && playerLevel[20] < 50) { addItem(554, 3); addItem(555, 3); addItem(556, 3); addItem(557, 3); addItem(558, 3); addItem(559, 3); addItem(560, 3); addItem(561, 3); addItem(562, 3); addItem(563, 3); addItem(564, 3); addItem(565, 3); addItem(566, 3); actionTimer = 3; addSkillXP(1000, 20); } if(playerLevel[20] >= 50 && playerLevel[20] < 65) { addItem(554, 4); addItem(555, 4); addItem(556, 4); addItem(557, 4); addItem(558, 4); addItem(559, 4); addItem(560, 4); addItem(561, 4); addItem(562, 4); addItem(563, 4); addItem(564, 4); addItem(565, 4); addItem(566, 4); actionTimer = 3; addSkillXP(2000, 20); } if(playerLevel[20] >= 65) { addItem(554, 5); addItem(555, 5); addItem(556, 5); addItem(557, 5); addItem(558, 5); addItem(559, 5); addItem(560, 5); addItem(561, 5); addItem(562, 5); addItem(563, 5); addItem(564, 5); addItem(565, 5); addItem(566, 5); actionTimer = 3; addSkillXP(8000, 20); } } } }

Step2: Add this global object.

makeGlobalObject(XXXX, XXXX, 2490, 0 ,10);

Your done.
[/quote][/code]

Offcorse thx who made it but i got an error can anyone tell me what is wronk
Thanks to evry one!!!

This is my error:

client.java:22532 unclosed string literal
tx4 =";
^
1 error
Finished!
